7.23.23  1:17 pm   how can you tell if you're feeling platonic or romantic love for someone you really like?

      i guess you'd have to get a dictionary and check out the definition of those words and see which one matches your feelings better

7.23.23  11:36 am   Hi, Bil! Do you have to know music theory (notes, altered chords, allegro etc) to make good music or is it enough to have a natural inclination towards it and the music will just fflow? 

     you certainly don't have to know italian, you certainly don't have to care what an 'altered chord' is because that's kind of a vague and niche term anyway, ......... maybe it would be cool to know what a note is, but even if you don't know it's called a 'note' then you'll probably just make up your own name for it anyway and be just fine

7.23.23  10:12 am   hey bill when you talked about the thing inventor inventing the thing inventor, did you time travel into the future and were giving us clues as to what ai will do like in all those conspiracy theory things

      compound invention is just common sense. it's the obvious natural extension of the trajectory that our entire world history has taken

      the center

7.22.23  7:44 pm   Why did you make this site

      because it was more efficient than emailing all of the items to everyone individually

7.22.23  6:23 pm   Why are the song dates in the song category different from the song upload dates on your YouTube channel? 

      generally i consider the song date and music video release date to be the same, but in rare cases it differs so drastically that it would simply be a lie to claim the song was made when the video was made. However, most of the time, they are close enough that i use the final video release date as the song's date on the song page. so the majority of them should indeed be the same. the only recent difference i can think of is "i'm a princess" where the song was entirely audio-locked by april 2019 but the video wasn't completed until 2021

7.22.23  2:28 pm   do you think i should go to another country for a few months once i have enough money?

      sure

7.22.23  1:40 pm   how to overcome death?

      i'm not sure

7.22.23  12:03 pm   why is everything so hard man

      to give you something to do

7.22.23  11:03 am   I am writing a song and I love the "rap" (at least just lots of word/syllable focus) section and I'm struggling to write the rest with a darker feel similar to it. The problem is I've already written the verses and chorus but they don't match the rap section. I know wacky transitions can be cool, should I try to make the whole thing a more consistent listening experience, or find a cool way to transition the sections? Although I'm thinking I may just have to break traditional structure and just do something entirely else that works.

      i'd say there is no need to EVER think about 'traditional structure.' always just treat the song at hand with love and care. it may very well end up aligning with 'traditional structure' anyway, but certainly don't try to do it like that on purpose. That would be like trying to make a brand new rotten apple to match last year's best-selling apple (which now happens to be rotten)

7.22.23  9:36 am   i know from your content you can put apples in a video, but can you ride on a shark?

      i can't, but maybe someone can

7.22.23  6:38 am   what is your opinion about having opinions in an opinianated way?

      my opinion about the person (1) who calls another person (2) 'opinionated' is that person 1 tends to actually have the stronger opinion. the word 'opinionated' should not be considered fair play, in my opinion

7.21.23  11:41 pm   are you autistic?

7.21.23  11:11 pm   Did you actually sing the shwz in at the airport terminal

     yes

     or did you just pitch yourself up and down?

     i don't use pitch alteration or pitch correction

     it'd be very impressive if you did the first.

     that was probably the easiest part of the song to sing, because it's supposed to sound goofy anyway, so it's really impossible to mess it up

7.21.23  8:42 pm   What is the secret to lyrical goodness and grammatical correctness?

      the secret to lyrical goodness is how it combines with the music. the secret to grammatical correctness is to align your speech habits with those of whomever wrote the most prevalent dictionary of your time. these 2 subjects: [lyrical goodness] and [grammatical correctness], often have nothing to do with each other

7.21.23  6:55 pm   bill what is your opinion on the cello?

      it might be a violin and everything around it shrank

7.21.23  5:41 pm   Why are they called Nine Inch Nails?

      probably because it was the only one on the list that didn't sound stupid after 2 weeks. this seems to me like the most plausible explanation

7.21.23  5:11 pm   sometimes i have an idea that i like, and then i get really excited about the idea, and i start thinking about how my friends will like the idea when i do it. then i do the idea, and i don't do it quite right the first time, and i imagine my friends looking at what i've done, and not liking it. then i give up. is this normal?

     possibly

     what do i do, help

      just be aware that it commonly creates a doom spiral when you start thinking about judgement from specific people. just like when you see the moon in the sky, it's like "oh, there's the moon." ........ sometimes it's like, "oh, there's the doom spiral triggered by thinking about judgement from specific people"

7.21.23  3:36 pm   Opinion on highways?

      it reminds me of a plane flight

7.21.23  1:19 pm   Do you ever wonder why rooms have to be this height?

     that's based on the height of a person, plus additional space to accomodate for taller than average people, or hand raises, or jumping

     Why not have a very tall bedroom?

     you can, and some people do. you might have to pay more because that might mean a larger house in general

7.21.23  12:30 pm   I am a time traveler in training. I'm actually quite good at going forward in time, but I can only do it at a set rate, and I haven't figured out to how to go backward in time at all. Do you have any advice?

      you'll have to figure out who and when 'you' is. you have already been back in time, but if you want that to be any different then you will have to parcel out a separate 'you' which is still experiencing the forward trajectory against the rest of the world being in reverse. then in fact all hell breaks loose

7.21.23  7:29 am   what am I supposed to do when in little conversations my partner keeps saying things like "you're terrible" but he says that by saying that he means that he loves me? like why can't he just then say that he loves me? 

      there might be some interesting stylistic nuance that he's conveying, but, regardless, you aren't perceiving it. so i think it's probably important for the two of you to start talking about how you communicate, so you can understand each other better

      i can't think of any. that sounds like a fantastic way of living
